landing_short_about_desc:
Academix lets you play, learn, and win.
Take part in live quizzes, earn digital rewards, grow your stats, and explore content created by real educators.
what_academix_is_desc: All the steps to the academix's core
laas_plat_desc: Academix is a gamified Learning-as-a-Service (LAAS) platform that turns knowledge into competition, community, and creator earnings.
newsletter_text: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and features
